title: (Tánaiste and Minister for Enterprise, Trade and Employment) (No. 2) Order
heading: 1. This Order may be cited as the Appointment of Special Advisers
text_raw:
1. This Order may be cited as the Appointment of Special Advisers 
(Tánaiste and Minister for Enterprise, Trade and Employment) (No. 2) Order
text_norm: 1 order may cited appointment special adviser (tanaiste minister enterprise trade employment) (no 2) order

title: (Tánaiste and Minister for Enterprise, Trade and Employment) (No. 2) Order
(Tánaiste and Minister for Enterprise, Trade and Employment) (No. 2) Order
heading: 2. Sarah O’Neill, particulars of whose address have been deposited at the
text_raw:
2. Sarah O’Neill, particulars of whose address have been deposited at the 
offices of the Department of Business, Enterprise and Innovation, is appointed 
to be a Special Adviser to the Tánaiste and Minister for Enterprise, Trade and 
Employment with effect from 27 July 2020.
text_norm: 2 sarah neill particular whose address deposited office department business enterprise innovation appointed special adviser tanaiste minister enterprise trade employment effect 27 july 2020

title: (Tánaiste and Minister for Enterprise, Trade and Employment) (No. 2) Order
heading: 3. Matthew Lynch, particulars of whose address have been deposited at the
text_raw:
3. Matthew Lynch, particulars of whose address have been deposited at the 
offices of the Department of Business, Enterprise and Innovation, is appointed 
to be a Special Adviser to the Tánaiste and Minister for Enterprise, Trade and 
Employment with effect from 14 September 2020. 

GIVEN under the Official Seal of the Government, 

22 December, 2020. 

MICHEÁL MARTIN, 

Taoiseach. 

Notice of the making of this Statutory Instrument was published in 
“Iris Oifigiúil” of 5th January, 2021. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 [709] 3
